long_description: This no-drill, multisport rack system for pickups puts the load up top so you can use your truck bed for all the rest of your stuff! Clamps onto truck bed rails without the need for drilling; combines with Yakima Round Bars (sold separately) to perfectly match truck width. Fits wide range of truck beds-available in full and compact sizes. Sold in half sets so that towers in the truck bed can be used in conjunction with rack over the cab; great for short beds. Perfect for carrying kayaks, canoes and much more. Heavy-duty construction handles loads up to 300 lbs. Nearly any Yakima accessory can be attached to the Yakima Round Bars (sold separately), giving this rack system multisport capability. Compact size weighs 25 lbs. and Full size weighs 26 lbs.
short_description: This no-drill, multisport rack system for pickups puts the load up top so you can use your truck bed for all the rest of your stuff!
